ai.summary: East Trail is a gentle 4.7 km hike in the UK, designed for beginners and casual walkers. The route offers light terrain and a relaxed pace, making it a quick outdoor option for a morning or afternoon outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained paths with grassy fields, with gentle inclines and flat sections. Expect some soft earth, gravel, and occasional muddy patches in wet conditions.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight before you go. Wear sturdy, waterproof footwear and dress in layers. Stay on marked paths, bring a map or offline navigation, and carry enough water and snacks. Let someone know your plans and watch for changes in weather. In rural areas, mobile coverage may be limited.
recommended_gear: Layered clothing and a waterproof jacket
Map, compass, or offline map on your phone
Phone with emergency whistle and basic first-aid essentials
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; winters can be cold, windy, and muddy depending on weather.

seo.title: East Trail – Easy 4.7 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover East Trail, a gentle 4.7 km hike in the UK. Easy terrain for beginners with practical safety tips and gear recommendations.
